metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18120 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
A double-free bug in the read_gif function in gifread.c in gifsicle 1.90allows a remote attacker to cause a denial-of-service attack or unspecifiedother impact via a maliciously crafted file, because last_name ismishandled, a different vulnerability than CVE-2017-1000421.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-18120` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gifsicle - 1.78-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: gifsicle package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.78-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
